Summary: Green object w. trail ejected two red "flares"--flares burned out in 2 seconds, green trail dimmed in 6.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn November 10th at 3am, several witnesses observed a greenish object traveling in a straight horizontal line from East to West about 5 degrees over the horizon--the object ejected two reddish "flares" before disappearing. Timeline: 0s: Greenish object appears, several people notice it. Object appears as bright as a space shuttle re-entering the atmosphere, and leaves a trail about as long. Object travels in-line with the horizon. +2s: Object ejects 1 flare-like red object, which falls a distance of about 1.5 inches (when measured at arm's length) +3s: Object ejects second flarelike object which matches the first +5s: Both "flares" have disappeared. +6s: Original green object disappears, having travelled about 6 inches (when measured at arm's length). No alcohol, drugs, etc were being consumed.
